item.title: CSS
item.description: I only slightly want to claw my eyes out. May I please just have pretty fonts? https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/CSS/Styling_text/Web_fonts https://discourse.gohugo.io/t/how-to-load-assets-from-the-static-folder-in-a-css-file/21005 Need to fix theme-vars.css with my actual desired fonts lol
item.content:encoded:
I only slightly want to claw my eyes out. May I please just have pretty fonts?

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/CSS/Styling_text/Web_fonts https://discourse.gohugo.io/t/how-to-load-assets-from-the-static-folder-in-a-css-file/21005 Need to fix theme-vars.css with my actual desired fonts lol
